fields.name: Item Price
fields.description: Calculates the price of the item by multiplying the price from product options by the item quantity.

fields.name: Total Order Price
fields.description: Calculates the total order price by summing the prices of three items.

  {fldaqxun06iiUFhdZ} = "In Stock",
  "None",

options.formula: "<iframe src='https://gamma.app/embed/" & {fldpG2UoUlqBC0tco} & "' style='width: 100vw; height: calc(100vh - 90px); border: none; display: block; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0; position: fixed; top: 90px; left: 0; right: 0; overflow: hidden;' allow='fullscreen' title='Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for MYA 5Y Microbalances'></iframe>"
